languages.text: {n}Иокаста скептично усмехается.{/n} "Ну так уж и псих... Чернь по натуре своей подла, ей такое вытворить — раз плюнуть. Но мы учтем вашу волю и присмотримся к самым буйным".

{n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста скептично усмехается.{/n} "Ну так уж и псих... Чернь по натуре своей подла, ей такое вытворить — раз плюнуть. Но мы учтем вашу волю и присмотримся к самым буйным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta twists her lips in a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look for the most violent among them."

{n}Jocasta twists her lips in a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look for the most violent among them."

{n}Jocasta twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

{n}Jocasta twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

{n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

{n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

{n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback verzieht ihre Lippen zu einem skeptischen Grinsen.{/n} "Einen Verrückten, sagt Ihr ... Das Gesindel ist von Natur aus niederträchtig und jederzeit dazu fähig. Aber wir werden Eurem Rat folgen und nur besonders gewalttätigen Zeitgenossen auf den Zahn fühlen."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback verzieht ihre Lippen zu einem skeptischen Grinsen.{/n} "Einen Verrückten, sagt Ihr ... Das Gesindel ist von Natur aus niederträchtig und jederzeit dazu fähig. Aber wir werden Eurem Rat folgen und nur besonders gewalttätigen Zeitgenossen auf den Zahn fühlen."

languages.text: {n}Un rictus sceptique vient tordre les lèvres de Jocasta.{/n} « Un fou, vous dites... La populace est vile par nature et n'aurait aucun scrupule à commettre une telle ignominie. Mais nous suivrons vos recommandations et nous ne chercherons que les plus violents d'entre eux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rictus sceptique vient tordre les lèvres de Jocasta.{/n} « Un fou, vous dites... La populace est vile par nature et n'aurait aucun scrupule à commettre une telle ignominie. Mais nous suivrons vos recommandations et nous ne chercherons que les plus violents d'entre eux. »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback te dirige una sonrisa escéptica.{/n} «Un lunático, dice... La chusma es vil por naturaleza y no dudaría en hacer algo como esto, pero haremos caso a su consejo e investigaremos solo a los más violentos».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback te dirige una sonrisa escéptica.{/n} «Un lunático, dice... La chusma es vil por naturaleza y no dudaría en hacer algo como esto, pero haremos caso a su consejo e investigaremos solo a los más violentos».

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは唇を歪め、疑わし気な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「狂人とおっしゃいましたが…暴徒たちは、その本性からして下劣です。そういったことを平気でやることでしょう。ですが、あなたの助言を受け入れ、連中の中から最も狂暴なもののみを探すとしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは唇を歪め、疑わし気な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「狂人とおっしゃいましたが…暴徒たちは、その本性からして下劣です。そういったことを平気でやることでしょう。ですが、あなたの助言を受け入れ、連中の中から最も狂暴なもののみを探すとしましょう」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克抿着嘴，露出了怀疑的笑容。{/n}“您说那是个疯子……那些乌合之众的本性非常卑劣，所有人都能做出这种事情。不过，我们会听从您的建议，从暴力倾向最严重的人开始排查。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克抿着嘴，露出了怀疑的笑容。{/n}“您说那是个疯子……那些乌合之众的本性非常卑劣，所有人都能做出这种事情。不过，我们会听从您的建议，从暴力倾向最严重的人开始排查。”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback'in bükülen dudaklarında kuşkucu bir sırıtış beliriyor.{/n} "Aklını kaybetmiş biri demek... Ayaktakımı, tabiatı gereği menfurdur. Böylesi bir cinayete hiç kafa yormadan girişebilirler. Yine de önerinizi dikkate alıp aralarındaki en şiddete yatkın olanları arayacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback twists her lips into a sceptical grin.{/n} "A lunatic, you say... The rabble is vile by its very nature, and would do such a thing in a heartbeat. But we will heed your advice and look only for the most violent among them."
